works.title: Fighting for market power
works.abstract: This chapter analyzes three aspects of developments in Norwegian aviation from an industrial economics perspective. It took four years after easing the hub airport's capacity problems before deregulation significantly affected competition. Next the market structure went from a stable duopoly, via capacity competition with an entrant, to an unstable...
